doc:
Brief METAR information in menubar.

```
  hs.loadSpoon('MetarMenu'):start({stationId = 'KARB'})
```

Download: [https://github.com/flav/MetarMenu/raw/main/Spoon/MeterMenu.spoon.zip](https://github.com/flav/MetarMenu/raw/main/Spoon/MeterMenu.spoon.zip)

Method.doc:
Starts MetarMenu

Parameters:
 * config - Configuration for fetching METAR
    * stationId - Station identifier

Returns:
 * The MetarMenu object

Notes:
 * Will show METAR in the menu, and poll for updates. Requires a valid METAR
notes: * Will show METAR in the menu, and poll for updates. Requires a valid METAR
Method.name: start

Method.doc:
Stops MetarMenu

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * The MetarMenu object

Notes:
 * This will remove menu item and stop polling for updates
notes: * This will remove menu item and stop polling for updates
Method.name: stop
